UserAgreement.title: User Agreement
UserAgreement.introduction: Welcome to use this application! Please read the following terms carefully before use. Continuing to use indicates that you fully accept this agreement:

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
content: This software does not collect any personal information; all local data is stored on your device.
Third-party services that may be called (such as image loading) will not transmit your private information.

license.title: Software License
content: This application is free and open-source software, distributed under the GNU GPLv3 license.
You have the right to: view the source code, modify the software, and freely distribute derivative versions.

minecraft.title: Minecraft Usage Guidelines
content: This is an unofficial launcher; you must have a legitimate Minecraft license.
Strictly prohibited: piracy, cheating tools, any behavior that violates the EULA.
The risks of using mods/resource packs are borne by the user.
This software has no affiliation with Mojang Studios/Microsoft.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
content: The developer is not responsible for indirect losses caused by the use of the software.
The content and stability of third-party services are not controlled by the developer.

updates.title: Agreement Updates
content: The developer reserves the right to modify this agreement, and updates will be notified through in-app announcements.

UserAgreement.contact: If you have any questions or suggestions, please provide feedback through [Developer Contact Information].
UserAgreement.thanks: Thank you for your support! Please enjoy the game legally and compliantly.
